content: a beautiful crochet tote bag for trips to the store farmers market library or anywhere else you re spending your day the slightly twisted tote works up quickly in a spiraling raised texture that is to die for reusable shopping bags are a great alternative to disposable plastic bags love this as a market bag free written pattern & video tutorial available at heather s craft corner 1 video tutorial of the full pattern can also be found here 2 left-handed video tutorial here 3 accessibility pattern video has option to use standard closed captioning provided by youtube not a specific feature for this pattern provided by the designer happy crocheting 1 https //www heatherscraftcorner com/slightly-twisted-tote/ 2 https //youtu be/4mw2wkhhcsi 3 https //youtu be/y4bgdkbqao8
